title: How can one prevent the aggregation of chitosan nanoparticles? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several methods to prevent aggreagation in general. Using a capping agent (as proposed PEG or others)… capping agent should be choosed according to your needs. Using very diluted solutions increase the time before aggreagation. This was the original attempt to create stable nanoparticles. If you create enough diluted solution the particles will not have chance to meet and aggregate. Such solutions have limited use but have advantage of having “pure” nanoparticles with unshifted surface states.
Try using a heavy polymer like PEG(2%) or PVP along with 1–2 drops of NaCl to stabilize the solution. Also please consult with a teacher first.
